vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.24;
son of: Shashak (H8349);
brother of: Ishpan (H3473), Eber (H5677J), Eliel (H0447I), Abdon (H5658I), Zichri (H2147I), Hanan (H2605), Hananiah (H2608O), Elam (H5867), Iphdeiah (H3301) and Penuel (H6439I)
§ Antothijah = "Jehovah's answer"
a Benjamite, one of the sons of Jeroham
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Sasac; jefe de familia; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
安陀提雅 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和華的回應"
便雅憫人沙煞的兒子 #代上 8:24|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
安陀提雅 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和华的回应"
便雅悯人沙煞的儿子 #代上 8:24|
